items.content_html: A minimalist To-Do List project showcasing essential functionality such as adding tasks, editing task descriptions, and removing tasks. Built using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity. Simplify your task management with this lightweight web application.
items.title: KrishPatel02/To-Do-List: A minimalist To-Do List project showcasing essential functionality such as adding tasks, editing task descriptions, and removing tasks. Built using HTML for structure, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for interactivity. Simplify your task management with this lightweight web application.

items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: uvarov-frontend/vanilla-calendar-pro: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
